go_data.justification: Pirh2 E3 ubiquitin ligase monoubiquitinates DNA polymerase eta to suppress translesion DNA synthesis, indicating DNA polymerase activity.
Pirh2 E3 ubiquitin ligase monoubiquitinates DNA polymerase eta to suppress translesion DNA synthesis.
The regulation of DNA polymerase Eta by nuclear proteins like p53 and Pirh2 suggests its nuclear localization.
